$
$
$
/$
$
/$
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Welcome to Rockin' Rhonda's
in Sanford, Florida!
/$
$
Our cozy and casual spot is the perfect place for locals to relax and unwind after a long day. Our friendly and welcoming atmosphere will make you feel right at home, whether you're a regular or a newcomer.
​
We offer a variety of drinks, including beer, wine, and cocktails. Catch the latest sports games on our televisions or enjoy our jukebox or live music on occasion.
​
Join us at Rhonda's Neighborhood Bar for a fun and comfortable experience where you can socialize with friends and neighbors.
We look forward to serving you!
/$
/$
/$
$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Hospitality Night
/$
$
Every Night!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Are you in the hospitality industry and looking for a fun and welcoming place to unwind after a long shift?
/$
$
Rhonda's is more than just a hangout spot - it's a community where everyone is welcome. We serve top-quality drinks, offer a cozy and comfortable atmosphere, and provide the perfect ambiance for you to unwind with friends. Every Night, we host Hospitality Night, a special event dedicated to those who work hard to serve others, industry employees get 10% OFF their tab. It's our way of giving back to the hardworking people who make our community what it is today!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$

$

Monday
$
$
$
MONDAY MEN'S NIGHT
/$
$
$10 Buckets
/$
$
of domestic beer
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Calling all gentlemen!
/$
$
Calling all gentlemen! Join us for Monday Men’s Night from 7-11PM. Enjoy $10 Domestic Buckets and $1 off all drinks. Gather your squad and unwind with great deals and even better company. See you there!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
Tuesday
$
$
$
Every Tuesday
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
$
$
Get ready to rock your Tuesday nights at
**Rockin' Trivia at Rockin' Rhonda's**
/$
$
Gather your smartest (or silliest) friends and show off your brainpower in an epic evening of FREE trivia fun! Join us Tuesday at 8 PM for a chance to win bragging rights and awesome prizes for the top 3 teams. Bring your energy and laughter, and let’s make it a night to remember—see you there!
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
Wednesday
$
$
$
Steel Dart Tournament
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Every Wednesday
/$
$
Get ready to test your aim and precision every Wednesday at our Steel Dart Tournament! Join us at 7:30pm for an exciting evening of competition with our Steel Darts Blind Draw. Check in at 7pm sharp, with the first dart flying at 7:30pm. The tournament has a $10 buy-in with a 20 player limit, secure your spot early! Plus, don’t miss the Super Shoot before the finals for added excitement. Bring your A-game and let the darts fly!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
/$
/$
Thursday
/$
$
$
$
$
Every Thursday
/$
$
Pool Tournament
/$
$
Calling all pool sharks! Dive into the action every Thursday night with our thrilling pool tournament starting at 8pm. Secure your spot by signing up at 7:30, and compete for glory and fantastic prizes for 1st and 2nd place. With a $10 buy-in, it’s your chance to show off your skills and claim victory. Don’t miss out on the excitement!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
$3.00
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Before 7PM
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
Friday
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Get ready for the ultimate Friday night extravaganza! Indulge in delicious bites from
Gufy Pinchos
from 12-8, then gear up for some friendly competition with our beer pong tournament starting at 9pm ($5 buy-in). And if that’s not enough, unleash your inner rockstar at karaoke with Rhonda also starting at 9pm. Join us for a night filled with food, fun, and unforgettable moments!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
KARAOKE
$
$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
Get ready to sing your heart out at Rhonda's Neighborhood Bar!
/$
$
Grab the mic and showcase your vocal talent at karaoke with Rhonda starting at 9pm. Whether you’re a foodie or a karaoke enthusiast, we’ve got the perfect Saturday night lined up for you. Don’t miss out on the fun!
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
As seen on TV
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
/$
$
Check your local listings.
/$
$
/$
$
IMDB
/$
/$
/$
/$
$
$
$
$
It's all about the music!
/$
$
Rhonda Pahlka aka Rockin' Rhonda has been playing music all her life. For the last two decades, she has felt lucky to call Central Florida home. In 1997, Rhonda started DJing & KJing private parties, night clubs & special events all over the Orlando area.
Today, she is the owner of Rhonda's A Neighborhood Bar in Sanford, Florida. "Open 8 days a week," as Rhonda would say. The venue is geared to host live music outside by the tiki bar, karaoke inside, open mic, along with acoustic jams & BBQs on the weekends.Rhonda's has something for everyone; corn hole, horse shoes, pool and a full liquor bar.
So if you are looking for something to do? Come on out! Bring a friend! Pull up a chair & have an ice cold beer. Come to Rhonda's A Neighborhood Bar where it's all about the music and having fun.
/$
/$
/$
ABOUT US
/$
$
CONTACT US
$
Give us a call
/$
$
407-330-3882
